cinnamon.name: Cinnamon
cinnamon.description: Cinnamon is a desktop environment for Linux and Unix-like operating systems that aims to be fast and user friendly.

gnome.name: GNOME
gnome.description: GNOME is a desktop environment for Linux and Unix-like operating systems that aims to be fast and user friendly.

kde-plasma.name: KDE Plasma
kde-plasma.description: KDE Plasma is a desktop environment for Linux and Unix-like operating systems that aims to be fast and user friendly.

xfce.name: XFCE
xfce.description: XFCE is a lightweight desktop environment for Unix-like operating systems, known for its efficiency and modularity.

lxqt.name: LXQt
lxqt.description: LXQt is a lightweight, modular, and fast desktop environment based on Qt technologies.

mate.name: MATE
mate.description: MATE is a continuation of GNOME 2, providing a traditional desktop experience with modern under-the-hood improvements.

budgie.name: Budgie
budgie.description: Budgie is a modern desktop environment designed for simplicity and elegance, originally developed by Solus OS.

deepin.name: Deepin DE
deepin.description: Deepin Desktop Environment is a visually appealing and user-friendly desktop environment developed by Deepin Technology.

pantheon.name: Pantheon
pantheon.description: Pantheon is the default desktop environment of elementary OS, known for its clean and intuitive design.

enlightenment.name: Enlightenment
enlightenment.description: Enlightenment is a highly customizable and lightweight window manager and desktop environment.
